UserOptionDefinition.BP_Creative_Accolades_C.Award.Descriptio: Awards the accolade to the player when the accolade criteria is met.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.Award.Description: Awards the accolade to the player when the accolade criteria is met.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.Description.Descri: Description of the accolade. This could include the requirements for completing the accolade.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.EnabledDuringPhase: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-Game includes all phases prior to the Game starting (the waiting for players lobby on Featured Islands and the Game Start Countdown).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.LimitAwardCount.De: Determines whether accolade has a limit on how many times it can be awarded to a player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.SelectedClass.Desc: Determines which Class can activate the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.SelectedTeam.Descr: Determines which Team can activate the device.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_Creative_Accolades_C.Disable.Descript: Disables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_Creative_Accolades_C.Enable.Descripti: Enables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.Icon.Description: Icon to use when using the large splash UI.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.InvertClass.Descri: If set, the device will count all but the selected class.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.InvertTeam.Descrip: If set, the device will count all but the selected team.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.TriggeringPlayerOn: If true, then only the triggering player is considered when granting this accolade.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.AwardCount.Descrip: Maximum number of times this accolade will be awarded per player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.Name.Description: Name of the accolade that will appear to players when the accolade is awarded.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.XPAward.Descriptio: Provides a weighting for the XP awarded by this accolade relative to other accolades on this Island.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.SplashSize.Descrip: Sets the UI size of the accolade. AUTOMATIC: XP Award determines the UI size. SMALL: Reticle notification only. LARGE: Splash with icon, title and description.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Accolades_V2_C.Test Award.Descrip: Use this event to test your accolade set up prior to publishing. NOTE: Only sends when the island is not published.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_Creative_Accolades_C.Test Award.Descr: Use this transmitter to test your accolade channel set up prior to publishing. NOTE: Only sends when the island is not published.
